title: ספר בחכמות הרפואות
author: Avicenna, 980-1037
description: Notes on the Canon Avicenna, with a lot of glosses and corrections (probably added by the user, who must have copied the medical book for his own use).
contents_note: Marginal heading ספר בחכמות הרפואות has been added by a later, Sefardi hand.
layout: Text is written in brown ink (from dark to light brown), in one column. Some marginal glosses in Hebrew.
dimensions: 205 × 160 × 16 mm (size of binding); 198 × 142 mm (size of leaf).
decoration: Simple pen-work decorations to mark the beginnings of new sections (done by the scribe).
binding: 18th century vellum over pasteboards; sewn onto three supports; text block edges sprinkled red; with shelfmark on the spine.
record_origin: Description based on Neubauer and Beit-Arié.
